title: What about this monster?
content:
True blue this one. I desperately want it.  
Amazed at how old it says it is.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090507185553im_/http:/typophile.com/files/rough-indeed_6501.jpg)
author: Julian Sirre

comments.content:
There was a Letraset type called [Stack](http://web.archive.org/web/20090507185553/http:/www.bowfinprintworks.com/LinedFontGuide05.html) that was along these lines, but remember you are looking at type from over 170 years ago. I think someone has been working on digitizing Stack, but I don’t know if that project is complete.

- Mike Yanega

Quite a show you’ve got going on there mr. Yanega. Loving the scans!  
I agree it has similarities with Stack but in my opinion it’s far superior.  
I hope someone will see the need for digitizing this one too.

I agree, the shadowing is much more dramatic in your sample. It would be a font with very limited use, but it is eye-catching, beyond a doubt.

- Mike Yanega
